Entreprenuerial mensch, people-connector extraordinaire, and marketing rock star!

Libby has over 12 years experience doing all sorts of cool stuff. And she can do that cool stuff for you too,...for the right price. good work aint cheap. Plus, she needs money for a girls weekend with her gal pals.

Seriously, after all this entrepreneuring and what-not, this Lady needs a break! There's nothing like putting your toes in the sand and drinking margaritas on the beach to calm the spirit. Help a sister out would ya. And her friends too. Word is, one of her besties is also poor and unemployed and in need of a beach vacation.
